block_text.room_desc:
Air-conditioned rooms are furnished with a cable LED TV, a well-stocked mini-bar and tea/coffee-making facilities. Private bathrooms provide a bathtub, hairdryer and bathrobe.

Suites are more spacious and feature a living area with sofa. They offer large windows with views of the Thu Le Lake or the City skyline.

Luxuriously furnished, suite offers breathtaking views of Thu Le Lake and the vibrant city. These spacious suites feature a comfortable bedroom and spacious work area.

Club guests will enjoy the use of a private lounge including the following benefits:
- Breakfast from 06:30 to 10:00 on weekdays and 06:30 to 10:30 on weekends
- Evening cocktails from 17:30 to 19:30
- Complimentary early check-in from 09:00 (subject to availability)
- Complimentary late check-out until 16:00 (subject to availability)
- Nonalcoholic beverages available all day
- Complimentary 1 hour usage of meeting room at the Business Center per day based on availability (non-accumulative)
- Complimentary 3 pieces of garments for laundry per day (non-accumulative)
- Complimentary nonalcoholic welcome drink, flower and fruit upon arrival
- Variety of international newspapers and magazines available for reading
- Complimentary broadband and wireless access in-room and in Executive Lounge
- Complimentary use of printer and work station at Executive Lounge

block.mealplan: Continental breakfast is included in the room rate.
block.name: King Suite - Non-refundable

policies.content: Note that if canceled, modified, or in case of no-show, the total price of the reservation will be charged.

block_text.room_desc:
Luxuriously furnished, this suite feature a comfortable bedroom and spacious work area. 

Club guests will enjoy the access to Club Lounge on the 16th floor and the following benefits:
- Daily buffet breakfast either in Cafe Promenade or Club Lounge from 06:30 to 10:00
- Evening cocktails from 17:30 to 19:30
- Complimentary nonalcoholic drinks from 06:30 to 22:00
- Daily newspaper and welcome fruit
- 2 bottle of mineral water and tea/coffee making facilities 
- Complimentary access to fitness center and swimming pool
- Complimentary scheduled shuttle service to downtown area 
- Express check-in and check-out 
- Complimentary 1 hour usage of meeting room at the Business Center per day based on availability

action_modal.details: For bookings made on or after April 6, 2020, be sure to consider the risk of the coronavirus (COVID-19) and associated government measures. If you don’t book a flexible rate, you may not be entitled to a refund. Your cancellation request will be handled by the property, based on your chosen policy and consumer law where applicable. During times of uncertainty, we recommend booking an option with free cancellation. If your plans change, you can cancel free of charge until free cancellation expires.
action_modal.title: Check your booking conditions

banner.subtitle: We recommend booking an option with free cancellation in case your travel plans change.
banner.title: As of April 6, 2020, your chosen cancellation policy will apply, regardless of the coronavirus.

hotel_text.important_information: Please inform Hanoi Daewoo Hotel of your expected arrival time in advance. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly using the contact details in your confirmation. Guests are required to show a photo ID and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.

policies.content: You can cancel free of charge until 1 day before arrival. You'll be charged the total price of the reservation if you cancel within 1 day before arrival.

All children are welcome. One child under 3 years stays free of charge in a crib.
One child under 5 years stays free of charge when using existing beds.
One child from 5 to 12 years is charged VND 277200  per night when using existing beds.
One older child or adult is charged VND 1386000  per night in an extra bed.
The maximum number of extra beds in a room is 1.
The maximum number of total guests in a room is 3.
The maximum number of cribs in a room is 1.
Any type of extra bed or crib is upon request and needs to be confirmed by management.
Additional fees are not calculated automatically in the total cost and will have to be paid for separately during your stay.
WiFi is available in the hotel rooms and is free of charge.
Free private parking is available  on site (reservation is not needed).
The property reserves the right to pre-authorize credit cards prior to arrival.
10 % VAT is included. 5 % Service charge is included. A City tax is not applicable.
items: A City tax is not applicable.

messages: Check for travel restrictions. Travel might only be permitted for certain purposes, and touristic travel in particular may not be allowed.
info_banners.title: Coronavirus (COVID-19) support
